class.name: AudioClock
class.brief_description: Synchronizes game logic to audio playback time.
class.description: The AudioClock monitors an [AudioStreamPlayer] and tracks the musical position (Measures and Beats) based on data provided by a [SongData] resource. It handles synchronization between the audio hardware clock and the game loop, and emits signals when musical events occur.

method.name: get_num_measures
method.description: Returns the total number of measures defined in the loaded [SongData].

method.name: get_song_time
method.description: Returns the current playback position in seconds. If the clock is synced to an AudioStreamPlayer, this reflects the audio DSP time; otherwise, it reflects an internal timer.

method.name: is_looping
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a loop section is currently active.

method.name: is_running
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the clock is currently processing time.

method.name: set_loop_bounds_measure
method.description: Sets the loop points using Measure indices. The clock will look up the corresponding timestamps from [member song_data] and enable looping.

method.name: set_loop_bounds_time
method.description: Sets the loop points using raw time (in seconds). When the song time reaches [param end], it will seek back to [param start].

method.name: start
method.description: Starts the clock. Resets internal timers if no AudioStreamPlayer is connected.

method.name: stop
method.description: Stops the clock. No signals will be emitted while stopped.

members.member: Path to the [AudioStreamPlayer] node that this clock should synchronize with.
The [SongData] resource containing the BPM map, measure offsets, and cue points for the current track.

signal.name: beat
signal.description: Emitted every time the clock detects a new beat.

signal.name: marker_passed
signal.description: Emitted when the playback position crosses a measure that contains a specific Cue or Section marker.

signal.name: measure
signal.description: Emitted every time the clock enters a new measure.
